name: 渡灵师-Demon Subduing Master
description:
There are three hundred and sixty lines in the world, but one line is unknown to the world. The Spirit Crossing Master, whose mission is to cross the ghosts and monsters from the world to the Yellow Spring, is the most unknown industry in this world.
Senior brother Yan Seventeen and junior sister Bai Muran went out of the mountain at the same time, and they hid in the city to perform the duties of the Spirit Crossing Master, but they experienced different strange events separately.
Of course, the elimination of evil spirits is the theme, but behind each event is more terrifying than ghosts, but the human heart is consumed by desire.
Each story in the work will be composed independently in the form of units.
School violence leads to blackened poor people, vain unfilial sons, cheating scumbags, abducted girls, disgusting human traffickers, you will meet all kinds of people here, some of them are pitiful, some are hateful, some are hateful, and some poor people must have something to hate.
Internet violence, marriage with insidence, school violence, cheating, and tragedies spawned by hot events will also appear in turn.
As a spiritual master, he constantly sees the evil of human nature in this world, and must protect his life.
Are you ready?

Game Features:
1. The work is mainly based on the plot, and you will see all kinds of human evil in the game, and the intention is profound. Male and female dual lines, players can choose to play as male senior brother Yan 17 or female line junior sister Bai Muran, experiencing different chapters respectively. Feel the twists and turns of the protagonist and supporting characters in each story.
2. The author's writing is delicate, directly hitting many current hot issues and feudal waste, which is thought-provoking.
3. You can choose the level of plot horror, and timid players can also try it boldly.
4. The interactive mode is not cultivated, the only thing to do is to save your own life.
5. In the world of ghosts, experience the vicissitudes of the world, sadness and funny coexist.
